# eQTL enrichments 

```{r}

library("viridis")

eqtl_enrich_plot <- function(enrich.df,myname){
  ggplot(data=enrich.df,aes(x=tissue,y=enrichment)) + 
    geom_point(size=2,shape=21,aes(fill=-log(pvalue,base=10))) + #,shape=as.factor(threshold))) + 
    facet_wrap(~eQTL+threshold) + 
    theme_bw() + 
    #scale_shape_manual(values=c(21,22,23,24),name="Classifer Threshold") +
    scale_fill_gradient2(low=viridis(n=2)[2],high=viridis(n=2)[1],
                         midpoint=-log(0.05,base=10),name=expression(-log10(p))) + 
    xlab("Classified Tissue") + ylab("Enrichment") + 
    ggtitle(myname) #+ coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,20))
}
 
```

```{r}

unweighted.df <- fread(work.dir %&% "analysis_files/eqtl-validation_unweighted.txt")
weighted.df <- fread(work.dir %&% "analysis_files/eqtl-validation_weighted.txt")

ggsave(plot=plt1,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-eqtl_unweighted.png",width=7,height=4)
plt2 <- eqtl_enrich_plot(weighted.df,myname="eQTL enrichment for classifed loci (weighted)")
ggsave(plot=plt2,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-eqtl_weighted.png",width=7,height=4)

```

# ATAC enrichments 


```{r}

atac_enrich_plot <- function(enrich.df,myname){
  ggplot(data=enrich.df,aes(x=tissue,y=enrich.factor)) + 
    geom_point(size=2,aes(fill=-log(p.val,base=10)),shape=21) + #shape=as.factor(threshold))) + 
    facet_wrap(~atac+threshold) + 
    theme_bw() + 
    #scale_shape_manual(values=c(21,22,23,24),name="Classifer Threshold") +
    scale_fill_gradient2(low=viridis(n=2)[2],high=viridis(n=2)[1],
                         midpoint=-log(0.05,base=10),name=expression(-log10(p))) + 
    xlab("Classified Tissue") + ylab("Enrichment") + 
    ggtitle(myname)
}

```


```{r}

read_input <- function(readstring="atac-enrichment_unweighted_thresh"){
  fvec <- list.files(work.dir %&% "analysis_files/")
  fvec <- fvec[grepl(readstring,fvec)]
  out.df <- c()
  for (f in fvec){
    threshold <- "0." %&% (strsplit(x=f,split="thresh")[[1]][2] %>% strsplit(.,".",fixed=TRUE))[[1]][1] %>% 
      as.numeric(.)
    sub <- fread(work.dir%&%"analysis_files/"%&%f)
    sub$threshold <- threshold
    out.df <- rbind(out.df,sub)
  }
  return(out.df)
}

unweighted.df <- read_input("atac-enrichment_unweighted_thresh")
weighted.df <- read_input("atac-enrichment_weighted_thresh")


plt3 <- atac_enrich_plot(unweighted.df,myname="ATAC enrichment for classifed loci (unweighted)")
ggsave(plot=plt3,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-atac_unweighted.png",width=12,height=8)
plt4 <- atac_enrich_plot(weighted.df,myname="ATAC enrichment for classifed loci (weighted)")
ggsave(plot=plt4,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-atac_weighted.png",width=12,height=8)


```



# Physiology (hard clustering) enrichment

```{r}
phys_enrich_plot <- function(enrich.df,myname){
  ggplot(data=enrich.df,aes(x=tissue,y=enrichment)) + 
    geom_point(size=2,aes(fill=-log(p,base=10)),shape=21) + #,shape=as.factor(threshold))) + 
    facet_wrap(~physiology+threshold) + 
    theme_bw() + 
    #scale_shape_manual(values=c(21,22,23,24),name="Classifer Threshold") +
    scale_fill_gradient2(low=viridis(n=2)[2],high=viridis(n=2)[1],
                         midpoint=-log(0.05,base=10),name=expression(-log10(p))) + 
    xlab("Classified Tissue") + ylab("Enrichment") + 
    ggtitle(myname)
}



```

```{r}

mod_thresh <- function(enrich.df){
  enrich.df$threshold <- gsub("assigned_","0.",enrich.df$threshold)
  return(enrich.df)
}

unweighted.df <- fread(work.dir %&% "analysis_files/phys-enrich_unweighted.txt") %>% mod_thresh(.)
weighted.df <- fread(work.dir %&% "analysis_files/phys-enrich_weighted.txt") %>% mod_thresh(.)

plt5 <- phys_enrich_plot(unweighted.df,myname="Physiology enrichment for classifed loci (unweighted)")
ggsave(plot=plt5,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-phys_unweighted.png",width=12,height=8)
plt6 <- phys_enrich_plot(weighted.df,myname="Physiology enrichment for classifed loci (weighted)")
ggsave(plot=plt6,filename = plot.dir %&% "enrichment-phys_weighted.png",width=12,height=8)


```
